0.user_question: Victor was working as a sacker at a grocery store where he made 6 dollars an hour. On Monday he worked 5 hours and on Tuesday he worked 5 hours. How much money did Victor make in those two days?

ost_step.1: Find out how much money Victor earned on each day. He worked for 5 hours at $6 an hour. So, he earned $5 x $6 = $30 on both Monday and Tuesday.
ost_step.2: Add the amount of money Victor earned on Monday and Tuesday to get his total earnings in those two days.
ost_step.3: There is $30 (Monday's earnings) + $30 (Tuesday's earnings) = $60 in total.
